physdesc.extent: Digital photographic images in tiff format.

did.abstract: 25 black-and-white digital photographs of the Empire Roller Skating Rink in Crown Heights.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: The digitized portions of this collection are available on our digital collections under the call number prefix PAGN.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Italian-American photographer Patrick D. Pagnano was born in in 1947 in Chicago, IL. He attended Columbia College Chicago before moving New York City with his wife Kari. He was hired as a photojournalist, but spent his free time persuing his own photography work. His book Shot on the Street was published in 2002. His work has been widely exhibited.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 25 black-and-white digital prints scanned from 35 mm film representing the Empire Roller Skating Rink in Crown Heights.
